x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
Most organizations (corporate, education, healthcare, government) accumulate unused or surplus items office furniture, electronics, supplies, branded merchandise, event leftovers, etc. as a byproduct of upgrades, moves or periodic buying cycles.
Surplus typically sits in storage, gets discarded or is inefficiently “given away” internally. Community organizations (schools, shelters, nonprofits) face shortages of exactly these items but there’s no streamlined way to connect supply and need. The process is ad hoc, informal and untraceable creating risks for loss and missed opportunities for social impact reporting.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Ideal Solution Vision

User Experience: Simple Unified Portal: Organization staff and vetted community partners access a single web/mobile app to post available goods, browse needs, and handle all approvals and logistics.
Automated Notifications & Status: Every step posting, request, approval, pickup, confirmation is communicated automatically, avoiding “lost in email” frustration.
Smart Matching: Partners can set preferences or urgent needs; the system suggests items or recipients based on inventory, location, past history, and fairness.
Visibility & Transparency: Dashboards display live stats such as donation value, environmental impact, and which groups are benefiting.
Impact Story Capture: Recipients can upload photos and stories of the difference these items make, which are published (with consent) for staff morale, PR, and stakeholder updates.
Audit-Ready Records: Every transaction is logged with supporting documentation, enabling easy reporting for compliance, tax or sustainability purposes.
Process Overview
Surplus Posting: Staff add items (with photos, specs) to an available inventory via a guided form.
Automated Review & Fair Allocation: Based on preset rules and/or prioritized criteria, the system routes requests, handles approvals and resolves conflicting claims.
Logistics Coordination: Pick-up/delivery is coordinated through integrated scheduling, with item tracking until confirmation.
Impact & Follow-up: Recipients confirm receipt and metrics aggregate for real-time corporate dashboards.

ServiceNow Products:
Core Products and Features
ServiceNow App Engine/ServiceNow Studio: Used to design, build and deploy custom workflows and data models specific to surplus asset redistribution.
Service Portal/ESC: For highly tailored user experiences—two main entry points for staff (posting assets) and community partners (requesting items).
Flow Designer: Automates notifications, approvals, allocation logic, and follow-up reminders.
Performance Analytics: Aggregates key program metrics (waste diverted, donation value, timeline metrics, partner engagement).
Mobile App :Allows both field staff (e.g., maintenance, facilities) and partners to engage on the go snap photos, update status and confirm pickups.
AI Search/Recommendation: Suggests best matches between available inventory and current community needs.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Integration : Asset/Inventory Management System-: To import or synchronize surplus asset data, location, and status, ensuring accurate posting.
